name: Eddies Electrical Exterminations
description:
You are Eddie. You kill faulty electric things. Today's Job: Destroy the robots at the pottery shops. But beware! destroy too many pots broken and you may end up in crippling debt!

this is my first gamejam game!

NOTE: I AM FIXING MANY BUGS FOR THE 1.1 VERSION INCLUDING BETTER SFX, PARTICLES,FIXES AND A RAMPED UP DIFFICULTY.  please keep tuned (and the game installed) for this 1.1 update, as i will update right after the voting process!

(gamejam : take care . how it fits: you must take care of the pottery)

CONTROLS

WASD - move

R - reload

SCROLL WHEEL - change weapon

you will have to close the game manually at the ending sorry :(

feel free to donate lol like that's ever going to happen
